ds2.3.3:57.2: asati → anussati (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | sammussanatā → pammussanatā (bj); pamussanatā (cck); asammussanatā (pts-vp-pli1)
ds2.3.3:74.2: Kammassakatañāṇaṁ → kammassakatāñāṇaṁ (bj); kammassakataṁ ñāṇaṁ (cck); kammassa kataṁ ñāṇa (pts-vp-pli1) | saccānulomikañāṇaṁ → saccānulomikaṁ ñāṇaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
